website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for someone looking for a classic style.
pros: Lightweight and easy to maneuver in tight spaces
Comes with caster wheels and a handle that makes it easy to push or pull
cons: Wood and brass accents won't work for every style

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with this purchase. It has a good weight to it and easy to put together. What you need to know: Remember to put the handles BEFORE you put the back legs. I would totally recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews thoroughly before ordering. Whoever said it took them 15 minutes, told a lie! It's not too hard, but you do have to think! No directions, only picture. It took me about an hour and a half, but I am pleased. A little wobbly, but I don't plan on moving it. When it came time to put it on top, I didn't screw something on tight enough. No tools needed. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suits us!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions really stink. The assembly of the back legs, handle, and casters really frustrated me until I realized the order I was supposed to do (no thanks to the directions. BUT - it is a wonderful, inexpensive buy. The gold, metal-looking accents are actually plastic but you wouldn’t be able to tell unless up close studying it. Functional, attractive, and affordable. I recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Stormy MeadowsTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great little cart. A bit small/low, but sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little cart. There were a couple nicks on it when it arrived, but nothing that couldn't be remedied. It's lower than I'd like, but for now it's a wonderful little bar cart and could later be repurposed in a guest room. It's definitely not a 30 minute job to put together unless you have a power driver, and even then likely not, but it's not complicated. The handle is a bit weird to put together but not difficult even for a novice like me. Overall well worth the small price and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty as the picture
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a play. It was super easy to assemble, but the handle is weird. Not sure how to make it secure because of the way that it goes on so we're just praying that it doesn't come apart. Either way, it is good looking and we intend to use it a lot for our shows!
customer_reviews.author: K. McLoud-Schingen

customer_reviews.title: Great cart!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a family member who was having surgery. It has been a lifesaver!! Works better than a tv tray and glides over the floor with little effort. They put a rubber placemat on the top to prevent any stains etc. They are thrilled and I am too.
customer_reviews.author: Goldiehwn1

customer_reviews.title: Chilllllllle, order this💕
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bar cart! The gold accents make it look expensive. The shelves are large enough to fit all of your favorite drinks and decor. All parts and tools were in the box, and it took 10 minutes to set up. If you need this right away, I would err on the side of caution. My shipment was delayed by almost a week. Shipping could've been delayed because of everything that's going on right now (pandemic). I didn't need it right away so I was fine. If you,like me, don't need this right away, order it! You won't be disappointed! Other than
customer_reviews.author: Terri h.

customer_reviews.title: Alright for the price
customer_reviews.text: I would've given this 5 stars if it didn't arrive scratched... also, the bottle holders do not accommodate standard sized wine bottles (or even my bottle of scotch), so I removed it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ella

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, Easily falls apart, looks nice, though.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions to assemble this item are very confusing. There isn't a lot of leeway for error, either. The entire cart is made of poster-board, so if you widen any of the holes too much, you're going to have a shaky cart. The handle is also incredibly difficult to get working properly. At present, the cart is assembled, but there is no way of getting the handle tight again without disassembling the cart, and decreasing the structure of the cart in the process. All the "gold" nobs are cheap plastic that easily fall off. It looks nice, though. Just don't try to move it....
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Just like a lot of other people, I had a little issue assembling the handle but other than that it was easy! When it was done it looked amazing and so far has held up for a few months being used at my BFs place. He was really happy to get it for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Serving Cart
customer_reviews.text: This cart is just beautiful. It was really easy to put together, took about 30 minutes. I was a little nervous because of all the handles, but was it easy. Great directions. The cart is a great size to use as a bar and looks so classical. Well made Cherry wood and a nice weight, not too heavy or too light. We are very pleased with it and so glad we purchased it. Looks just great.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice if you get one that isn’t scratched
customer_reviews.text: The instructions weren’t that easy to follow but one can figure it out. I had to get the first one replaced because it had scratches on it. The replace was easy and came in fast but even that wasn’t perfect so I returned it as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations, it looks very fancy. The directions aren’t the best, however it’s very simple to assemble so you can figure it out. I love it, it was exactly what we needed! Definitely would recommend. It’s sturdy, and again it compliments our home.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: if you are disabled or crippled like I am
customer_reviews.text: This is incredibly well made for the price. Also, if you are disabled or crippled like I am, this thing is the best investment ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: For the money, there is no way you can beat this little thing........I replaced the Castors with Foot Pedals. It's a very beautiful piece of furniture. A little small, but very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Victor V.

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Serving Cart
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so this serving cart is so adorable and very handy. It can hold a good bit of items and rolls well. It was a lot of pieces to put together but it was easy to do and didn’t take too long. There was one short leg at the bottom that connects a wheel that I could not tighten all the way but it doesn’t interfere with the cart or the wheels. I have set it up and have effortlessly rolled it around. I am pleased with my new cart! Update... I took the leg off and put it back on and it tightened fine.
customer_reviews.author: Timeka

customer_reviews.title: Functional cute light weight
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, color true to picture, moves easily light weight, top handles doesn’t tighten we had tinker with it for a bit ; we bought it for a gift for our son’s pool parties
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Mae

customer_reviews.title: WOW! super nice quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Looks very classy in my office! add the decanter/glass set they sell on here to really complete the set. Nice quality brass look fixtures and wood. easy assembly. A+++ Product!
customer_reviews.author: RyanG

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are quite cheaply made. First, it comes in a ton of pieces for you to put together, but it isn't difficult to assemble. Any liquid spilled makes the particle board bubble up and the wheels roll almost too well. It will continue to roll even when you stop it and there is no break to set. Not the best purchase I've ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: imported very well
customer_reviews.text: table looks nice but is made carelessly. Upper slat is not finished and one part cracked
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Very useful for bringing dishes from kitchen to other rooms. Not tremendous space but usually enough for two. Screws keep coming loose however.
customer_reviews.author: Thatcatdavid

customer_reviews.title: cute little serving cart!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my aunt's chinese restaurant. It's really cute, even cuter than in the pic, and matches the restaurant perfectly. Almost all parts are wooden. At first I thought they were plastic, so that was a good surprise. It's easy to put together, and it took me only less than 20mins. The only thing is it's a little short. My aunt is only 5' and it's still a little short for her.
customer_reviews.author: M. Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces...but a beautiful cart
customer_reviews.text: Product came with two right handles and no left handle to finish assembly. Was told to take a picture of manufacture sticker on cart...there is no sticker anywhere on cart. Luckily we kept the box that has the sticker on it. Waiting to see if company will send us a replacement part. Otherwise, it’s a beautiful cart.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Received my package on time! It was easy and simple to put together I would recommend a drill but a screw driver will do! The only part I had trouble with was the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Teea

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I love this it’s very cute . It’s comes in a lot of pieces but once you figure it out it goes quickly. The instructions are pretty clear for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: KARA

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Came out beautiful and the perfect size for what I needed. Highly recommend this bar cart.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten a lot of compliments on this. It's small, but that's why I like it. The color looks really red in the pictures, but it matches my expensive furniture perfectly. The only thing I don't love is the guild accents. I might take it apart someday and paint them. It's not that big of a deal though. It was a good piece for the price.
customer_reviews.author: tcrog

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Looks really good, the assembly was easy although you do need a screwdriver just fyi
customer_reviews.author: ttabs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to any house without a built in bar
customer_reviews.text: Classy as anything, bought one when we moved in for a full the bar cart party and haven’t looked back since
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Norris

customer_reviews.title: Instructions could be clearer
customer_reviews.text: Had slight trouble putting parts together since there were no words in the instructions but we really like the outcome and use the cart all the time.
customer_reviews.author: tamu bowrey

customer_reviews.title: Lots of bits, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: This cart arrived in a very small, flat package. Immediately I knew - the dreaded Some Assembly Required. I was very pleasantly surprised by how easily the cart went together. No real instructions, just some pictorials. Be sure to verify and identify all the parts before you start. After the top and bottom shelves are completed, start assembly from the Top. The parts were all precision cut and finished and all the bolts had metal inserts in the wood which made assebly quite easy. I'm very satisfied with the cart; not too large and easy to move around. The price is reasonable for what you get. The product is made in Taiwan.
customer_reviews.author: J Eihganrac

customer_reviews.title: Terrifiic tea cart!
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable tea cart. I saw another review that said there were pieces missing. That did not happen with mine. It does have a lot of assembly but it's worth it. It took about 1 and 1/2 hours to put together. Granted, it's not heirloom quality furniture but, for the price, it's well worth it. I got it for my Mom. She usually eats in the living room. She only has make the trip once with this cart!
customer_reviews.author: K. Ott

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap.. This is the only piece from Amazon ...
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap..This is the only piece from Amazon I regret buying..flimsy the handle doesn't stay on ..so I gave it a nice home in the attic with the rest of my junk...haha..where it belongs ..
customer_reviews.author: christina piemonte

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit. Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit. Nice size, sturdy, plain but attractive. All parts were there and fit perfect. Assembly was easy. The handle assembly a bit tricky- good brain teaser !! I find it more useful than a simple tray table costing almost as much.
customer_reviews.author: A. venditti

customer_reviews.title: Nice cart!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Tons of compliments. small but exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: MzLadyBull

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price and very informal use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in lieu of the Pottery Barn Kids Tea Cart for a six year old. It was half the price and she loves it As a toy, it is very nice. However, the "gold" accents in the photo are plastic and look very yellow. This is not a cart that I would use when entertaining adults
customer_reviews.author: LizardLvr

customer_reviews.title: works really good, even works on a carpet but make sure ...
customer_reviews.text: works really good, even works on a carpet but make sure u tighten the screws and recheck after the first couple of uses. They needed a few to be tightened again
customer_reviews.author: Fisherman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I read all of the reviews an decided to take a chance. I am so glad that I decided to purchase this cart! It is super classy and elegant. It does come in a lot of pieces but it is super easy to assemble. Great quality for half the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s an awesome deal for the price. It’s very very pretty. One of the great buy from amazon

customer_reviews.title: Service price ha. No one call us back
customer_reviews.text: This is not wood not good on carpets not made well sorry seller shipped this in a perfect eay
customer_reviews.author: Take care of the earth it's our home 🏡

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent , very nice tone. A little tricky to assemble specially fitting the handle. 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Ashkan

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Cutest thing i have ever bought from amazon! Lovely color. Very light. Chic. Easy to assemble east to move. I am so excited since two days ago when i assembled it, still am!!
customer_reviews.author: arezoo

customer_reviews.title: Bar Cart
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and it fits in a certain spot in my home
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, good for the low low price
customer_reviews.text: Got this today, seemed like a bunch of parts but only took about 15 minutes to set up, I didn’t even have to look at the instructions. For $50 I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a smaller space
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, very attractive, some of the plastic parts have some minor quality issues but overall for the price, it's awesome. Perfect for a smaller space.
customer_reviews.author: Miller F.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Lots of storage. Not as tall as I thought it would be. But it looks elegant and is durable. Guests won't stop complimenting me.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Nice Looking!
customer_reviews.text: This bar cart exceeded my expectations. It is so easy to put together too! I received many nice compliments on it during the holiday season. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: LDP1130

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: There were no instructions! But... I was able to put it together.... enjoying it too!!! I love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana Ray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A very nice piece of furniture and well made. Rolls even on my carpet. Worth every penny!

customer_reviews.title: Best Serving Cart
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, best price outta there and look awesome, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: KronosTime

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Very nice looking in our dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on this all the time. It has held up and handled all my booze for almost four years. It could use more wine storage space but I have separate racks so that doesn't bother me. The only issue I had was with water damage (from a roof leak). It warped the wood. So for making drinks, either clean up quickly and keep the cart dry or just make your drinks on another surface.
customer_reviews.author: jnd123

customer_reviews.title: Nice cart!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and very helpful stylish cart. It makes transfer of food from kitchen to family room easy and spill free.

customer_reviews.title: looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking right size holds a great deal the prize is right love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy, can’t use as a tea cart
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy at all! If you never move it and put nothing on it then it’s ok. Can’t use as an actual cart. Barely used, light tea set on it and it’s falling apart and marked up. In a week.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: cheap
customer_reviews.text: cheap, cheap, cheap. Don't buy this. Go find a drink cart at an antique store.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Well-Priced Cart
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our living room and it has added a nice touch. As opposed to some other commenters, we were able to fit standard sized wine bottles in the bottle holder without a problem. Fine to assemble. Not a luxury item but good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Serving Cart - Cherry
customer_reviews.text: I bought my 10 year old Granddaughter a Tea Set for Christmas. When her Grandparents come over from England, she likes to serve tea in her fancy tea cups and "Tea Cart". Overall very nice item, reasonably sturdy and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Millie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this cart--it's so much prettier than the photo---love it! :)

customer_reviews.title: Just as picture

customer_reviews.title: Great value; fantastic product

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Love this size very useful especially since I cannot have a coffee table because of little kids

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to assemble. The photograph captures the true color of the wood. The style and color coordinate well with my old, classic dining room furniture. The cart is small, so it fits in and doesn't dominate the room. I am very happy with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: cheap junk

customer_reviews.title: Nice cart for the money

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a really handy serving cart, I really like it and it has everything that I wanted in a serving cart.

customer_reviews.title: Cute old-fashioned look
customer_reviews.text: A lot of fiddly pieces. Very top bar tends to pull off. Need to glue it. It's cute. Old fashioned look. I use it as a bedside table as my bed is much too high for standard size.

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift that was enjoyed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. They love it and it looks snazzy.

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift for someone and i am honestly in love with the cherry looking wood and gold

customer_reviews.title: Great piece for the money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my dining room for such little money. Easy to assemble. I spray painted the brass decorative pieces for a more updated look.

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: looks good in picture but very poor quality. all shiny parts are plastic and breakable, boards easy to scratch, the screws were loose and did not fit stable into the boards, the handle is weak and loose, not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Tang

customer_reviews.title: a touch of class
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to say the instructions was not well written, but it was not difficult to figure it out. The cart is very cute. I'm using to rest my tea set in my front room. It looks lovely!! Ideal for transporting from room to room. The only improvements to be made in function, would be the wheels. It does not roll smoothly from hardwood to low-lying rugs without hanging up on the rug. You have to gently lift up the cart to get it onto the rug. For the price, it is a great value. Just understand the wheels are a hinderance.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: It looks super fancy and I get a lot of compliments about ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks super fancy and I get a lot of compliments about it. (I don't really roll mine around though so I can't comment on the quality of the wheels)

product_meta.title: Coaster CO- Serving Cart Accents, Merlot and Brass
product_meta.description: This classy serving cart will look at home in either your formal dining room or rec room. It features a handle pushing and top roomy top shelf for a cheese plate and two snifters of cognac. Bottom shelf includes a bottle holder for three bottles of your favorite Bordeaux and/or single malt. Elegantly crafted with merlot finish and brash-finish metal accents. Gives your room a traditional countryside appeal.
feature_bullets: Solid hardwood frame finished in cappuccino
Two (2) tiers of shelving with safety guardrails
Measurement: 24.75" width x 15.75" depth x 31.25" height

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars366 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
